plugin.name: DemonMUSH Mapper
plugin.author: Demon and Pwar
plugin.description: This is the official DemonMUSH Graphical Mapper.

plugin.name: DemonMUSH Chat Window
plugin.author: Demon
plugin.description: Displays all communications in a window. Tabs can be added to the window, and channels assigned to new tabs.

plugin.name: DemonMUSH Big Gauges (SOON)
plugin.author: Pwar
plugin.description: Displays hp/mana/move/exp/enemy/alignment gauges. The right-click menu offers major customization functionality.

plugin.name: DemonMUSH Group Window (SOON)
plugin.author: Pwar
plugin.description: Displays hp/mana/move gauges for you, your minions, your pets, and your teammates.
